name: Spicy Jalapeno and Bacon Flatbread
author: Philadelphia
summary: Spicy jalapeno cream cheese is spread on a flatbread crust, sprinkled with crumbled bacon, veggies, and cheese and baked until golden brown.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) tub PHILADELPHIA Spicy Jalapeno Cream Cheese Spread
8 slices cooked OSCAR MAYER Butcher Thick Cut Applewood Smoked Bacon, crumbled
¼ cup thinly sliced red onion
1 cup KRAFT Shredded Three Cheese with a Touch of PHILADELPHIA
directions: Pat pizza dough into 16x12-inch rectangle on lightly floured baking sheet
Spread crust with cream cheese spread; top with remaining ingredients
or until shredded cheese is melted and crust is golden brown
